summary: An email chain from July 12, 2019, between an FBI New York office and a former FBI agent, discussing a potential male victim with information on Jeffrey Epstein's network. The former agent references an investigative journalist friend and a deceased retired police officer who were working on human trafficking, and mentions the victim has information on high-level government figures, including a former president. The email also references the murdered Arkansas Senator Linda Collins-Smith.

persons.name: Moore
persons.role: Investigative journalist, former US Intelligence Community member
persons.context: Friend of the email sender, trusted with investigating human trafficking. Was working with a retired female cop and has a male victim with information on Epstein and high-level government people.

persons.name: Linda Collins-Smith
persons.context: Mentioned as having been in contact with the email sender about a CPS corruption case and having a lot of information on child trafficking. Her murder is noted, and it is believed the FBI is working her case.

connections.description: Described as a trusted friend with whom the sender would trust their life. They are collaborating to connect a potential victim to the FBI.
Moore was working with the victim, found him credible, and is trying to get him to the FBI NY office to give a statement.
The sender was in contact with the senator about a CPS corruption case for a few months prior to her murder.

events.title: Email referral of potential Epstein victim
events.description: A former FBI agent emails the FBI NY office to refer a potential male victim who has information on Epstein's trafficking network and high-level government figures.

events.title: Murder of Arkansas Senator Linda Collins-Smith
events.description: Referenced as a recent event. The senator was murdered and had information on child trafficking.

keyFacts: A credible male victim was identified with information aligning with the Epstein case, including specifics on high-level government people and one former president.
The information came via an investigative journalist (Moore) and a now-deceased retired female police officer who were working on human trafficking.
The email sender, a former FBI agent, had previously been in contact with murdered Arkansas State Senator Linda Collins-Smith about child trafficking and CPS corruption.
The communication shows an active effort in July 2019 to connect a potential victim/witness with the FBI's Epstein investigation in New York.
